dict.string: Take calls, skip songs and adjust volume right from the cord of your Beats Studio headphones. No more searching for your phone or music player just to find the right song.
When we first announced the studio headphone edition, we made a promise that battery life would be amazingly during. We believe we kept that promise with a non-stop playback time of 298 hours.

Receiving a call while listening to music is no longer a pain, thanks to the built-in microphone we added to the remote. When receiving a call, simply press a button and you can freely talk while keeping your headphones on!

Super plush and covered with ultra-soft breathable materials, youâ€™ll be cool and comfortable even during marathon listening sessions. The Beats by Dr. Dre logo on the side also acts as a mute button when you press it. No need to take them off to talk.

Powered by a pair of AAA batteries, the noise cancellation feature in a pair of stylish Beats Studio headphones amplifies the music as it blocks out noise, giving you consistently powerful and intense sound.

We believe that anyone who tries our product, will instantly fall in love with it. We even are so convinced of our product, that we offer you a 30-day money back guarantee, no strings attached. Go for it!
